algorithms.name: substitute an env()
algorithms.html: To <dfn class="dfn-paneled has-dfn-panel" data-dfn-type="dfn" data-export="" data-local-lt="substitute" id="substitute-an-env" role="button" aria-expanded="false" tabindex="0">substitute an env()</dfn> in a property or descriptor:

steps.html: If the name provided by the first argument of the env() function is a recognized environment variable name, the number of supplied integers matches the number of dimensions of the environment variable referenced by that name, and values of the indices correspond to a known sub-value, replace the env() function by the value of the named environment variable.

Otherwise, if the env() function has a fallback value as its second argument, replace the env() function by the fallback value. If there are any env() references in the fallback, substitute them as well.
Otherwise, the property or descriptor containing the env() function is invalid at computed-value time.
